data.title: Download Free PDF
data.meta_description: Bibliografija - Free ebook download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides a list of 107 references related to conceptual metaphor research from 2001 to 2012. The references cover topics such as metaphor comprehension, conceptual metaphors in different languages and cultures, metaphor in various domains like advertising, economics, politics, and more. Many of the references are journal articles, book chapters, and conference papers.
